room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Portage in Portage
review: We did the Antidote room. It was so much fun and we made it out with 6 minutes left.

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Portage in Portage
review: Went there yesterday for the first time with my boyfriend and it was excellent! Very friendly staff and the game started right on time. We were in the "Antidote" room and it gave us a nice adrenaline rush!

room_title: Escape room "Antidote" by Escapology Portage in Portage
review: 4/6 of my group had never done an escape room before (myself included), and we managed to escape with twelve minutes to spare. I would highly recommend for a night out with friends! Shoutout to our game master Tyler who made Antidote a fantastic escape room experience.
